nodes.text: Star Wars Inside Intel: The Four Sages of Dwartii

"Star Wars Inside Intel: The Four Sages of Dwartii" is a StarWars.com article written by Lucasfilm Story Group member Emily Shkoukani. Part of the Star Wars Inside Intel article series, it details the Four Sages of Dwartii, who were depicted merely as statues in the Star Wars prequel trilogy.
Learn the story behind the mysterious statues decorating the office of Chancellor Palpatine.
